amendment.description: Amendment in the nature of a substitute allows an exemption under the Fair Labor Standards Act for official court reporters while they are performing transcription duties and being paid on a per-page basis.
amendment.purpose: An amendment in the nature of a substitute recommended by the Committee on Economic and Educational Opportunity.

action.text: Amendment (A001) in the nature of a substitute offered by the Committee on Economic and Educational.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Economic and Educational amendment (A001) Agreed to without objection.
